# VSCode

## Debug

`.vscode/launch.json`

[Remote debugging](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/nodejs/nodejs-debugging#_remote-debugging)

[Breakpoints in VSCode](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/nodejs/nodejs-debugging#_breakpoints)

[Source maps](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/nodejs/nodejs-debugging#_source-maps)

[Debugging React](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/nodejs/reactjs-tutorial#_debugging-react)

[Next.js Debugging with chrome devtools](https://nextjs.org/docs/advanced-features/debugging#debugging-with-chrome-devtools)

[Next.js debugging with VS Code](https://nextjs.org/docs/advanced-features/debugging#debugging-with-vs-code)

### Browsers

[browser](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/nodejs/browser-debugging)

[attaching to browsers](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/nodejs/browser-debugging#_attaching-to-browsers)

[Next.js client-side](https://nextjs.org/docs/advanced-features/debugging#client-side-code)
